title: Quran Recitation With Urdu Translation-Qari Abdul Basit
description:
1 Install Quran Reciter 

2 Install toolbar for IE or Firefox for online Quran or Harith help .

3 Copy all 114 Surahs to the installation directory ie
C> program files> Guided ways> recitation > abdulbasit.

the Quraan reciter iS a free app from Guidedways.com but they have 
only Arabic Quran so i added they translated version into the same app . 
All u need to do is to copy paste the Surahs into the directory and remove 
or overwrite the original files there .

Best of luck and say prayers for the original contributers and for me too . Allah Hafiz .
